item.description:
5/18/09 UPDATE: TRIP IS SOLD OUT!

We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this exciting hotel/camping mixed adventure through New England!

The group will travel July 11 - 18, 2009. The maximum group size will be 12 people, so book quickly!

Continuing our series of popular and affordable group tours, we bring you the amazing New England on a Budget. Join the club July 11-18, 2009 on this hotel/camping mixed group tour.

Price: $899
(NOTE: for those local to the Portsmouth area, cost reductions are available... please contact Kevin for details)

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join us as we explore some of the best sites in New England:

  • A tour through the amazing White Mountains of New Hampshire
  • A drive up to the summit of Mt. Washington
  • Camping under the granite cliffs of Franconia Notch State Park
  • Check out the beaches and villages of the Maine and New Hampshire Seacoast
  • Enjoy a traditional Maine lobster in our included group dinner
  • Take a fun group river tubing trip down the lazy Saco River
  • And we start and end it all at a 4-star hotel in beautiful, historic Boston, MA



Places Visited: Group Tour of New England, Boston, White Mountains of New Hampshire, Southwestern Coast of Maine, Franconia Notch State Park, Crawford Notch State Park

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, visit our website or contact us at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: New England on a Budget - Boston, White Mountains & The Maine Seacoast - 8 Days
